items.title: contact__has_telephone
items.description: Customer has a registered telephone number.

items.title: credit__amount
items.description: Amount of money requested as part of credit application (in EUR).

items.title: credit__coapplicant
items.description: Co-applicant on credit application.

items.title: credit__duration
items.description: Amount of time the credit is requested for (in months).

items.title: credit__guarantor
items.description: Guarantor on credit application.

items.title: credit__installment_rate
items.description: Credit installment rate (as a percentage of the customer's disposable income).

items.title: credit__purpose
items.description: Customer's reason for requiring credit.

items.title: employment__duration
items.description: Amount of time the customer has been employed at their current employer (in years).

items.title: employment__permit
items.description: Customer's current work permit type.

items.title: employment__type
items.description: Customer's current job classification.

items.title: finance__accounts__checking__balance
items.description: Customer's checking account balance.

items.title: finance__accounts__savings__balance
items.description: Customer's savings account balance.

items.title: finance__credits__other_banks
items.description: Count of credits the customer has at other banks.

items.title: finance__credits__other_stores
items.description: Count of credits the customer has at other stores.

items.title: finance__credits__this_bank
items.description: Count of credits the customer has at this bank.

items.title: finance__other_assets
items.description: Customer's most significant asset.

items.title: finance__repayment_history
items.description: Quality of the customer's repayment history.

items.title: personal__num_dependents
items.description: Count of the customer's dependents.

items.title: residence__duration
items.description: Amount of time the customer has been at their current residence (in years).

items.title: residence__type
items.description: Class of the customer's residence.

title: Credit Application
description: An array of items used to describe a credit application.
